name: Rabbit-Man RPG [DEMO V 0.8)
description:
It's bedtime and you're all set to rest your mind and drift off to slumber-land. However, something gnaws at the back of your mind. Those childhood fears of monsters hiding under the bed ready to pounce on your defenseless sleeping body, or demons in your closet awaiting until you are just about to fall asleep, only to drag into into the darkness.

You beg your parents to check for them, but even after they do, you are not satisfied. They are only hiding until your parents leave. As you wait in the darkness, coming to terms with your fate, the earth around you trembles and lightning fills the air. You awaken and your parents are gone and your house is filled with monsters.

Maybe those childish fears weren't so childish after all.

Fight your way through monsters and explore a hellish world in this action/horror #RPG . You are not a brave warrior or lone badass, you are a small child in there pajamas. Your only options are to run, fight or DIE!!!

INCLUDES THE ORIGINAL WEBCOMIC FROM 2019.

#adventure #rpg #adult #retro #survival #shooter #altgame #other #rpgmakervxace #rpgmaker #horrorrpgmaker #horror #rabbitman #rabbit #man #indiegame #demo #wip #parasiteeve #actionhorror #tradgedy
